Description: MIDNIGHT GRIND - NPC Dialogue and Character Lines

Kai.Name: Kai
Kai.Description: Veteran street racer who takes you under his wing

Luna.Name: Luna
Luna.Description: Genius mechanic who runs your garage

Officer_Chen.Name: Officer Chen
Officer_Chen.Description: Lead detective of the street racing task force

FirstBoot.Speaker: Kai
FirstBoot.Line: So, you want to make a name for yourself on these streets?

FirstBoot.Speaker: Kai
FirstBoot.Line: It's not about the car you drive. It's about how you drive it.

FirstBoot.Speaker: Kai
FirstBoot.Line: Let me show you the basics. After that, you're on your own.

FirstDrive.Speaker: Kai
FirstDrive.Line: Feel that? That's the connection between you and the machine.

FirstDrive.Speaker: Kai
FirstDrive.Line: Smooth inputs. The car responds to how you treat it.

FirstWin.Speaker: Kai
FirstWin.Line: Not bad, rookie. Not bad at all.

FirstWin.Speaker: Kai
FirstWin.Line: But one win doesn't make you a legend. Keep pushing.

FirstLoss.Speaker: Kai
FirstLoss.Line: Hey, we all eat dust sometimes. What matters is getting back up.

FirstLoss.Speaker: Kai
FirstLoss.Line: Analyze what went wrong. Learn. Adapt. Come back stronger.

GarageIntro.Speaker: Luna
GarageIntro.Line: Welcome to my workshop! I'm Luna. I keep the machines running.

GarageIntro.Speaker: Luna
GarageIntro.Line: Bring me parts, and I'll make your ride sing.

GarageIntro.Speaker: Luna
GarageIntro.Line: Just... don't ask where I learned to do this. Trade secrets.

Lines.Speaker: Maya
Lines.Line: Fresh face at my event? Interesting.

Lines.Speaker: Maya
Lines.Line: The rules are simple: cross the line first, don't die.

Lines.Speaker: Vince
Lines.Line: Another wannabe? This should be quick.

Chapter1_VinceDefeat.Context: Player beats Vince for the first time

Lines.Speaker: Vince
Lines.Line: This isn't over. Not by a long shot.

Lines.Speaker: Kai
Lines.Line: You made an enemy tonight. And maybe a little respect.

Lines.Speaker: Officer_Chen
Lines.Line: I've been watching you. You've got talent.

Lines.Speaker: Officer_Chen
Lines.Line: But talent doesn't excuse breaking the law.

Lines.Speaker: Officer_Chen
Lines.Line: One day, you'll have to choose which side you're on.

Chapter3_CrewInvite.Context: Player is invited to join a crew

Lines.Speaker: Maya
Lines.Line: The Midnight Runners want you. That's... rare.

Lines.Speaker: Maya
Lines.Line: A crew is more than just racing together. It's family.

Lines.Speaker: Maya
Lines.Line: Think about it. This offer won't last forever.

Confident.Speaker: Kai
Confident.Line: You've got this. Trust your instincts.

Confident.Speaker: Luna
Confident.Line: The car's running perfect. Now it's on you.

Underdog.Speaker: Kai
Underdog.Line: They're faster on paper. But paper doesn't race.

Underdog.Speaker: Luna
Underdog.Line: I've tuned her as best I can. Make it count.

Rematch.Speaker: Vince
Rematch.Line: Back for more? Fine. Let's settle this.

Win.Speaker: Kai
Win.Line: Clean. Professional. That's how it's done.

Win.Speaker: Maya
Win.Line: People are starting to talk about you.

CloseWin.Speaker: Kai
CloseWin.Line: That was too close. Lucky beats good... once.

CloseWin.Speaker: Luna
CloseWin.Line: My heart can't take these finishes!

Loss.Speaker: Kai
Loss.Line: Tough break. But there's always next time.

Loss.Speaker: Luna
Loss.Line: Don't beat yourself up. Let's look at what happened.

Dominant.Speaker: Maya
Dominant.Line: That wasn't a race. That was a statement.

NewPart.Speaker: Luna
NewPart.Line: Ooh, nice pickup! This'll add some serious punch.

NewPart.Speaker: Luna
NewPart.Line: Let me install this. It'll be ready in no time.

LowFunds.Speaker: Luna
LowFunds.Line: Running a bit tight on cash? Win some races!

LowFunds.Speaker: Luna
LowFunds.Line: I can't work miracles without parts, you know.

NewCar.Speaker: Luna
NewCar.Line: A new ride? Let me give it a once-over.

NewCar.Speaker: Luna
NewCar.Line: Nice choice. I've always wanted to work on one of these.

FullyUpgraded.Speaker: Luna
FullyUpgraded.Line: This thing is maxed out. It's a work of art.

FullyUpgraded.Speaker: Luna
FullyUpgraded.Line: I don't think there's anything left to add. Perfect.

Spotted.Speaker: Radio
Spotted.Line: Cops! We've got heat on your tail!

Spotted.Speaker: Kai
Spotted.Line: Stay calm. You know these streets better than them.

HighHeat.Speaker: Radio
HighHeat.Line: This is getting serious. Find a way out!

HighHeat.Speaker: Kai
HighHeat.Line: They're not playing around. Time to disappear.

Escaped.Speaker: Kai
Escaped.Line: Clean getaway. Now lay low for a while.

Busted.Speaker: Officer_Chen
Busted.Line: Thought you could outrun us? Think again.

Busted.Speaker: Radio
Busted.Line: That's gonna cost you. Be more careful next time.

Intros: You're listening to Midnight FM. I'm DJ NEON, and these streets are alive tonight.
It's 2 AM and you're still grinding. That's what I like to hear.
The city never sleeps, and neither do we. Let's ride.
TrackIntros: Here's a track that'll get your engine revving.
Turn it up. This one's a classic.
New heat coming at you. Feel that bass.
Commentary: Word on the street is there's a new racer making waves. That you?
Police are out in force tonight. Keep your eyes open.
The underground's buzzing about the race at the docks. You gonna show?
LateNight: 3 AM. The real ones are still out here.
The roads are empty. Perfect time to push it.
If you're hearing this, you're one of us. Respect.
